rooms.Name: The front porch
rooms.Description:
The front porch of this massive gothic mansion is made of heavy
black marble and has huge pillars that rise up the entire height
of the house to an arched overhang.  There is a large mat beneath
your feet and the front door looks unlocked.  The front yard is
very dark and eerie to either side of you.

Exits.Description: The front door of the mansion looms before you.
The yard continues to the east.
A short drive leads back towards the main gate.
The yard continues to the west.

ExtraDescs.Description: The floor mat beneath your feet reads "EMOCLEW".

rooms.Name: The entranceway
rooms.Description:
The entryway of the mansion places the dark, menacing interior of
the house before you and the safety of the outside world behind
you.  The air is cold, damp, and filled with odd, disturbing odors.
Do you really want to enter?

Exits.Description: A large hallway is to the north.
A heavy oak door hangs on polished brass hinges.
The front door of the mansion is to your south.
A heavy oak door hangs on polished brass hinges.

rooms.Name: The main hall - center
rooms.Description:
This huge entryhall has a ceiling that towers far overhead,
covered with chandeliers that are draped heavily with cobwebs
and dust.  Two curving stairways rise from the east and west
and converge above you at a doorway.  There are doors to the
east and west and a hallway to the north.  The front door of
the mansion is directly to the south.

Exits.Description: A hallway leads to the north.
The main hall continues to the east.
This passage leads back to the front door.
The main hall continues to the west.

rooms.Name: The main hall - west side
rooms.Description:
Here on the west side of the main hall of the mansion, there
is a curved stairway leading up and to the east.  The dirty
chandeliers high above you cast an uncertain light on the room,
causing you to constantly glance at the shadows.  The odor of
rotting vegetation and damp earth assails your nostrils.

Exits.Description: The center of the main hall is to the east.
A room filled with plants is visible to the west.
Some curving stairs lead up to a room with music coming from it.

rooms.Name: The main hall - east side
rooms.Description:
Here on the east side of the main hall there is a sweeping
marble staircase that leads up and to the west towards a
landing on the second floor.  The flickering light cast by the
chandeliers high above you causes the shadows to move in a
manner that makes you uneasy.  The smell of must and dust and
ancient leather assails you from the room to the east.

Exits.Description: The library is visible through a doorway to the east.
The center of the main hall is to the west.
Some stairs curve up towards a room with music coming from it.

rooms.Name: Hallway
rooms.Description:
This hallway is extremely wide with a very high ceiling.  It
connects the large entry hall with a large room to the north that
appears to be some sort of museum for armor.  A fountain is
gurgling noisily in the center of the room to the north.

Exits.Description: A dimly lit room with a fountain is to the north.
A huge hall is visible to the south.

rooms.Name: The cloakroom
rooms.Description:
Rusty coathangers and rotting, moldy garments are crammed into 
this dingy closet.  The air reeks of mothballs and mold, and the
garments you see before you fall apart at the touch.

Exits.Description: A door leads back out of the cloakroom.

rooms.Name: The top of a dark staircase
rooms.Description:
Frigid, stale air flows unevenly from the bottom of the stairs
which descend into the darkness to the east and end at a door
to the west.  The stairs here are heavily worn and you can hear
odd sounds echoing quietly from the depths below.  The stairs
are rather rickety, you should be careful on them.

Exits.Description: A faint light shines from beneath this door.
The steps continue down into the darkness.

rooms.Name: The Arboretum
rooms.Description:
This high-ceilinged room has many large windows which are all
covered with heavy black crepe.  In this dingy area there are
dozens of potted plants, shrugs, and small trees.  A thick
damp odor permeates the room which continues to the north or
exits to a hallway to the east.

Exits.Description: The aboretum continues to the north.
This entrance leads back to the main hallway.

rooms.Name: The Arboretum
rooms.Description:
The northern end of the arboretum is full of strangely dead 
shrubs and trees.  As you inspect some of these potted plants,
you realize that the leaves have all been snipped off carefully,
without almost surgical precision.  Someone must take their
pruning very seriously.

Exits.Description: You can see a hallway to the north.
The aboretum continues to the south.
A lush greenhouse is just to the west.

rooms.Name: On the curving stairs
rooms.Description:
The massive marble stairs are dark and discolored.  They lead
up towards the second floor where a doorway leads to the
north.  Below, the main entryway is clearly visible.  Perhaps
it is a good time to leave while you can still see the door?

Exits.Description: A noisy party is going on just beyond the top of the stairs.
The stairs lead down to a large hallway.

rooms.Name: On the curving stairs
rooms.Description:
The wide marble stairs are dark and discolored beneath your
feet.  They curve up to a second floor landing where a door
can be seen, leading to the north.  Below you the stairs lead
back down to the main entryhall.  The sputtering light given
off by the chandeliers does not illuminate the stairs well
so you tightly grip the bannister as you use the stairs.

Exits.Description: The stairs lead to a doorway from which loud music is blasting.
The stairs lead down to a large hallway.

rooms.Name: At the top of the stairs
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a marble landing high above the entryway
hall below.  Dark marble stairways curve down from both sides
of the landing, leading back to the hall below.  The doorway
to the north is open and you can clearly hear the sounds of
voices and music coming from the brightly lit room within.

rooms.Name: The Greenhouse
rooms.Description:
Just west of the arborium, you are standing at the eastern
end of a long, narrow greenhouse that is filled with the most
unusual and disgusting-looking plants that you have ever seen.
Odd and unsettling smells permeate the room which stretches
far to the west.  The green glass makes the entire room look
unearthly and you feel uncomfortable with the thought of
exploring this place.

rooms.Name: The Greenhouse
rooms.Description:
The huge greenhouse that is attached to the west side of the
mansion is indeed made of green glass.  The weird light that
illuminates the room only makes the strange and unfamiliar
flora look even more exotic and bizarre.  The air is filled
with the pungent and almost overpowering scent of the various
plants that appear to be growing wild.  You hear an occasional
rustling sound that really doesn't sound like an animal.

rooms.Name: Into the cauldron
rooms.Description:
What are you, a total idiot?  Burning pitch sears into your flesh
as you scream in agony, thrashing about in the boiling fluid.  You
can feel the flesh curling away from your bones as you try not to
succumb to the blistering heat.

Exits.Description: The outside of the cauldron looks MUCH more comfortable.

rooms.Name: The library
rooms.Description:
The library is a long, narrow room with floor to ceiling shelving
built into the walls.  These shelves are densely packed with old,
dusty books, manuscripts, and papers of all sorts.  Spider webs
cover most of the books and the dust obscures most of the titles.
There is a comfortable-looking easy chair here and the room smells
of rancid tobacco smoke.

Exits.Description: The doorway leads to another room.
A bookcase full of dusty books stands here.
The doorway leads back to the main hallway.

rooms.Name: Hidden room
rooms.Description:
This small room is dusty and smells of moldy paper and leather.
The walls are unpainted and there is some sort of hinged panel
on the western wall that seems to be the only exit.  You sneeze
a few times and feel the urge to get some fresh air.

Exits.Description: A hidden panel leads back into an adjacent room.
A heavy wooden trapdoor lies beneath your feet.

rooms.Name: Inside the iron maiden
rooms.Description:
You are standing within the incredibly cramped confines of this
large iron maiden.  Nasty spikes are pressing uncomfortably
against you as you look carefully within the cast iron horror.
You keep looking over your shoulder to make sure that the iron
maiden doesn't close on your while you are in it.

Exits.Description: The door of the iron maiden is lined with spikes.

rooms.Name: The study
rooms.Description:
This room is panelled in dark wood and has numerous shelves full
of dusty books lined along the walls.  Various medieval-looking
shields and weapons are mounted to the walls, and somehow they
all look like they are in beautiful working condition.  The large
desk here has the usual blotter, paper, and writing instruments.

Exits.Description: A hallway is visible to the north.
A library is visible to the south.

rooms.Name: The Hall of Armor
rooms.Description:
This large hall is adorned with numerous shields and weapons
mounted on the walls as well as various displays of medieval
armor.  A dark fountain appears to be broken in the center of
the room which smells strongly of oil and leather.

Exits.Description: The Hall of Armor continues north.
The Hall of Armor continues east.

rooms.Name: The Hall of Armor
rooms.Description:
You are standing inside the south entrance of a large hall that
appears to be a museum of some sort.  Dozens of shields, weapons,
and other instruments of war are mounted on the walls around the
room.  Various suits of armor are displayed here throughout the
hall which must explain the strong odor of oil and leather.  
There is a black fountain to the north and an exit to the south.

Exits.Description: The Hall of Armor continues north towards a fountain.
The Hall of Armor continues east.
The Hall of Armor exits south onto a hallway.
The Hall of Armor continues west.

rooms.Name: The Hall of Armor
rooms.Description:
Here in the southeast corner of this large hall, you have an
excellent view of the scores of weapons, shields, and battle
flags that cover the walls of this large room.  There are several
suits of armor displayed here and in the center of the room is
a strangely silent fountain.  There are exits on all four sides
of the room.

Exits.Description: The Hall of Armor continues north.
The Hall of Armor continues west.

rooms.Name: The Hall of Armor
rooms.Description:
At the western side of the Hall of Armor your nostrils detect
the smell of oil and leather from the hall and a somewhat
earthen smell coming from the hall to the west.  The hall itself
is decorated like a war museum with shields, spears, swords, and
suits of armor displayed throughout the large room.  A dark
fountain sits quietly in the center of the room.

Exits.Description: The Hall of Armor continues north.
The Hall of Armor continues east towards a fountain.
The Hall of Armor continues south.
The Hall of Armor exits west onto a hallway.

rooms.Name: The Hall of Armor
rooms.Description:
Here in the center of the Hall of Armor you can truly take in
the grandeur of this museum-like room.  Carefully mounted on
the walls of this room are scores of weapons, shields, banners,
and other tools of the warrior including some complete suits
of armor.  There are four exits to the room radiating out to
the four points of the compass.

Exits.Description: The Hall of Armor continues north.
The Hall of Armor continues east.
The Hall of Armor continues south.
The Hall of Armor continues west.

rooms.Name: The Hall of Armor
rooms.Description:
Here in the Hall of Armor the walls are covered with scores of
war banners, shields, weapons, and various other tools of war.
There is a large fountain in the center of the room and various
suits of armor are displayed here.  There is a hallway to the
east and exits from the hall on the other three sides of the hall.

Exits.Description: The Hall of Armor continues north.
The Hall of Armor exits east onto a hallway.
The Hall of Armor continues south.
The Hall of Armor continues west towards a fountain.

rooms.Name: The Hall of Armor
rooms.Description:
The walls and floor of this northwest corner of the Hall of
Armor has an odd red tint.  All around you, the walls are covered
with various implements of war that the Addams have collected
over the centuries.  A large black fountain is in the center
of the room and hallways exit the room from all four sides.

Exits.Description: The Hall of Armor continues east.
The Hall of Armor continues south.

rooms.Name: The Hall of Armor
rooms.Description:
Standing here at the north end of this hall, you detect some
rather disagreeable odors coming from the hall to the north.
There are suits of armor, swords, spears, and battle flags
displayed throughout the hall like a museum.  There are exits on
all four sides of the hall and a black fountain sits right in
the center of the room.

Exits.Description: The Hall of Armor exits north into a hallway.
The Hall of Armor continues east.
The Hall of Armor continues south towards a fountain.
The Hall of Armor continues west.

rooms.Name: The Hall of Armor
rooms.Description:
This corner of the hall seems to have an odd greenish tinge to
the walls and floor.  Above your head there are dozens of shields,
swords, spears, and other instruments of war displayed throughout
the hall.  A large black fountain rests in the center of the room
and four hallways radiate away from the hall in all four
directions.

Exits.Description: The Hall of Armor continues south.
The Hall of Armor continues west.

rooms.Name: East hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the end of a fairly long hallway that ends
to the east and continues to the west.  There is a door to the
north and several more doors are visible to the west.  You detect
the faint odor of turpentine here.

Exits.Description: A dark room is just to the north.
The hall continues east.
A large hall is just to the west.

rooms.Name: East hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the end of a long hallway that stretches
off to the west.  There is a massive stained glass window
to the east but it is too dark to make out the design.  You
can see a door immediately to the south and a door on the
north side of the hallway a few feet to the west.

Exits.Description: A room is to the south.
The hall continues west.

rooms.Name: West hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing south of a doorway in a hallway that leads both
east and west.  A large hall is visible to the east and there
appear to be some shadowy figures lurking in the corners.  Some
doors are visible to the west and you notice the smell of wet earth.

Exits.Description: A heavy door made of ebony is to the north.
The hall leads to a large room.
The hall continues west.

rooms.Name: North hallway
rooms.Description:
The hallway here is rather wide and is panelled in dark wood that
has been draped with black crepe.  Dusty and covered with spider
webs, the hallway leads south to a large room and continues to
the north.  Your nose detects a faint odor of something that you
can't quite put your finger on.

Exits.Description: The hall continues north towards the odd odor.
The Hall of Armor is just to the south.

rooms.Name: West hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing in an east-west hallway that opens onto a room
to the south and continues east.  A lavish arboreum lies to the
south and several doors can be seen farther east down the hall.
The smell of wet earth and vegetation is overwhelming here.

Exits.Description: The hall continues east.
The Aboretum is just to the south.

rooms.Name: North hallway
rooms.Description:
This wide hallway is panelled in dark mahogany and has black crepe
draped along the walls.  The moldly smell of rotting cloth and
old wood is very strong here but you notice some even more
unpleasant odors coming from the north.

Exits.Description: A large dining room is just to the north.
The next room seems to be a portrait gallery.
The hall continues south.

rooms.Name: The dining room
rooms.Description:
This elegant dining room has a huge table that could easily seat
twenty guests.  High-backed chairs surround the table which is
covered with an incredibly thick layer of dust.  Cobwebs trail
from the chandelier overhead.  Some odd objects clutter the top of
the table.  Some look suspiciously like bones.

Exits.Description: An elaborate french door leads out to the terrace.
The room exits onto a hallway leading south.
The kitchen is just to the west.

rooms.Name: The kitchen
rooms.Description:
This large kitchen is filled with huge, commercial ovens and
cooking equipment.  Filthy and swarming with vermin, these gaping
ovens and encrusted stove tops have cooking utensils scattered 
about and all sorts of unpleasant things crunch underfoot.  For
some reason, this kitchen does NOT make you feel hungry.  There is
a small sign hanging above the stove.

Exits.Description: A large dining room is just to the east.
The kitchen continues south.
A heavy wooden door appears to lead back outside.

ExtraDescs.Description: The sign reads, "If it moves, eat it!"

rooms.Name: The pantry
rooms.Description:
This tiny room is filled with sagging wooden shelves filled with
hundreds of rusting cans with illegible labels.  Bags of some
sort of grain have spilled out onto the floor and the copious
amount of rat droppings indicate that it is a popular spot to eat.

Exits.Description: A door leads back out of the pantry.

rooms.Name: The kitchen
rooms.Description:
This side of the kitchen appears to be the food preparation area
as there are numerous tables and preparation tools spread about.
There is a freezer to the east and some stairs leading down to
the south.  A dumbwaiter is built into the west walls where it
gapes like some sort of screaming creature.

Exits.Description: The kitchen continues north.
The freezer door is cold to the touch.
A worn wooden door is to the south.
A dumbwaiter is built into the wall to the west.
Some narrow stairs lead down into the darkness.

rooms.Name: Dumb waiter
rooms.Description:
Braced here in the dumbwaiter shaft, cold air is blowing from 
below causing you to shiver, almost loosing your grip.  The glint
of jagged pieces of metal can be seen both above and below you.
Your arms are tiring.  You had better decide on which way you 
want to go before you fall.

Exits.Description: The kitchen looks almost homey as you struggle not to fall.
The dusty shaft above looks dark and slippery.
The dusty shaft below looks dark and slippery.

rooms.Name: Dumb waiter
rooms.Description:
You foolishly attempt to climb in the dumb waiter shaft and slip,
plummeting into the darkness and hitting the bottom with bone-crushing
force.  All you can see is red as agony flares through your body
with mind-shattering intensity.  You feel your life begin to slip
away as you valiantly struggle to hold on . . .

Exits.Description: A room with padded walls looks like the only way out.

rooms.Name: Dumb waiter
rooms.Description:
You are squeezed into the very bottom of the dumb waiter shaft.
Odd sounds echo from above you as cobwebs and dust make you want to
sneeze.  As you look up into the darkness, you realize that you will
not be able to climb back up the shaft.

Exits.Description: The dingy padded cell may be the only way out.

rooms.Name: A padded cell
rooms.Description:
You are in an extremely small padded call which appears to have
only a single exit.  The dumbwaiter set deep into the wall from
which a warm breeze is blowing.  You search the room, poking
at the rotting padding that is tacked to the walls.  A sense of
despair overcomes you as you realize there may be no exit.

Exits.Description:
The opening of a dumb waiter gapes darkly in the wall to the west.
Odd sounds echo from it and are quickly swallowed up by the padded
walls of this cell.

rooms.Name: The terrace
rooms.Description:
You are on one side of a long terrace that is built behind the
Addams family mansion.  Low walls run around the edge with small
openings where stairs lead down to the lawn.  Colorful Japanese
lanterns swing here in the chilly wind, casting odd shadows
in the somewhat unsettling back yard.  French doors to the south
lead back into the house.

Exits.Description: The backyard continues to the north.  You see a shed in the distance.
The backyard continues to the east.
An elaborate french door leads back to the dining room.
The terrace continues to the west.

rooms.Name: The terrace
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the western end of a long terrace that looks
out over the backyard of the mansion.  There are some door visible
to the east that lead back into the house.  Stairs lead down to
the yard and the oddly dead grass.  Bright paper lanterns are
strung here.  When you look closely, you realize that the 
lanterns resemble skulls.

Exits.Description: The backyard continues to the north.
The backyard terrace continues to the east.
The backyard continues to the west.

rooms.Name: In the front yard
rooms.Description:
You are standing in half-shadows in the front yard of the Addams
Family mansion, just east of the front porch.  It is extremely
dark to the east and you can barely make out a dark shape on
the ground.  You seem to hear the sound of wind whistling to
the east.

Exits.Description: The yard continues.
The entrance is just to the west.
A narrow trench here looks rather deep.

rooms.Name: In the front yard
rooms.Description:
Here at the southeast corner of the mansion, you have an excellent
view of both the mansion and the steep gorge to the east.  You
seem to detect music coming from somewhere above you, perhaps 
there is a party going on?  You step carefully as the steep cliff
to the east looks dangerous and the ground looks oddly dark to
the west.

Exits.Description: The side yard extends to the north.
The front yard continues west.

rooms.Name: In the front yard
rooms.Description:
You are standing in half-shadows, just west of the dimly
illuminated front porch of the Addams Family mansion.  It is
inky black to the west although you can make out the shadowy
outline of the house.  The front porch to the east doesn't look
very welcoming but it looks better than the darkness to the west.

Exits.Description: The entrance is just to the east.
The front yard continues to the west.

rooms.Name: In the front yard
rooms.Description:
Here at the southwest corner of the Addams Family mansion, it
is still very dark and eerie in the dense shadow cast by the
monstrous building.  It is too dark to see much of anything
besides the dense black stone walls of the mansion.

Exits.Description: The side yard extends to the north.
The front yard continues to the east.

rooms.Name: In the side yard
rooms.Description:
Here outside of the Addams family mansion it is oppressively
dark as the sprawling mansion easily blocks all the light from
the sun.  The grass here is stunted and oddly colored.  You can
see a door in the side of the house to the north and you can
barely see a dim path leading down the hill to the north that
leads to what appears to be a cemetary.

Exits.Description: The side yard continues to the north.
The side yard continues to the south.

rooms.Name: In the side yard
rooms.Description:
You are on the Addams family mansion grounds, on the west side
of the house.  There is a doorway here from which some truly
disgusting smells are emanating.  The ground is sloping gently
down to the north and you can clearly hear the wind whistling
through the rafters above your head.

Exits.Description: The side yard continues to the north.
A thick wooden door leads into the house.
The side yard continues to the south.

rooms.Name: In the side yard
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the yard just outside the northwest corner of
a large, hulking mansion.  A steep gravel walk winds down the hill
to the west and you can see an overgrown terrace a bit to the east.
The wind is blowing sharply around the corner chilling you to the
bone.

Exits.Description: The back yard extends to the north.
The backyard continues to the east.
The side yard extends to the south.
A gravel path leads down the hill towards a cemetary.

rooms.Name: In the side yard
rooms.Description:
You are moving across the dead grass here in the side yard of
the Addams family mansion.  The side of the mansion is featureless
here and you have little choice but to go north or south.  To 
the east the lawn drops off precipitously into a steep gorge.
Best not go that way.

Exits.Description: The side yard continues north.
The side yard continues south.
A very steep slope leads down to a rocky gorge.

rooms.Name: In the side yard
rooms.Description:
Here outside the east side of the mansion, a narrow expanse of
lawn terminates abruptly against a steep cliff that leads down
to a rocky gorge.  You feel oddly claustrophobic as you make 
you way along this narrow and somewhat perilous area.  You look
for a door to enter the house but see nothing here.

Exits.Description: The side yard continues north.
The side yard continues south.
A steep slope leads down to some jagged rocks.

rooms.Name: In the side yard
rooms.Description:
Here on the eastern side of the mansion, the ground slopes steeply
down to a rocky crevice.  Falling would surely be fatal so you
walk very carefully.  You are near the back yard and you can see
the glow of tiny lights to the west.  All of the mansion windows
appear to be unlit.  Perhaps nobody is home?

Exits.Description: The back yard is to the north.
The side yard extends to the south.
The backyard is to the west.
A steep precipice leads down to some jagged rocks.

rooms.Name: In the backyard
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the backyard of a large mansion that looms
darkly to the south.  There is a large terrace to the east and
some sort of structure farther to the north.  You can make out a
path snaking its way down the hill to the west towards what may
be a cemetery.

Exits.Description: The backyard continues to the north.
A large terrace is just to the east.
The backyard continues to the west.

rooms.Name: In the back yard
rooms.Description:
Here at the northeast corner of the mansion, the wind is blowing
sharply and you are instantly chilled to the bone.  There is a
large wooden structure of some sort to the north and a brightly
lit terrace to the east.  You can't shake the impression that
you are being watched.

Exits.Description: The backyard continues north towards some kind of wooden structure.
The backyard continues to the east.
A large terrace is to the west.

rooms.Name: The ballroom
rooms.Description:
Just inside the ballroom, you feel yourself being pulled into
the party.  Loud music is blasting from a bandstand somewhere
at the other end of the room.  Through the hazy cigarette smoke
you catch glimpses of some shimmering lights up on the ceiling.

Exits.Description: The ballroom continues north towards a noisy band.
The ballroom continues east.
The ballroom exits to the south.
The ballroom continues west.

rooms.Name: The ballroom
rooms.Description:
In this corner of the ballroom you have a fairly good view of
the entire party.  There is a door to the north from which a cool
breeze is blowing.  The bandstand is across the room past the
disco ball and the bar is towards the west.

Exits.Description: The ballroom continues north.
The ballroom continues west.

rooms.Name: The ballroom
rooms.Description:
Just to the west of the entrance to the ballroom, you have a great
view of the room although almost everything is hard to make out
in the thick swirls of smoke that fill the room.  There is a door
just to the north that leads into a room where you can hear
the clink of glassware.  Perhaps you can get something to drink?

Exits.Description: The ballroom continues north.
The ballroom continues east.

rooms.Name: The ballroom
rooms.Description:
This is probably the best spot in the entire ballroom.  Still on
the dancefloor but close to the bar!  What a great place to 
hang out and enjoy the party.  You can barely hear the clink
of glassware from the bar over the loud music that echoes 
through the ballroom.  You look at the crowd and wonder if you
might get lucky!

Exits.Description: The ballroom continues north.
The ballroom continues east.
The ballroom continues south.
A french door leads to the bar.

rooms.Name: The ballroom
rooms.Description:
The ballroom is a huge, domed room with stained glass windows
surrounding the ceiling that is at least thirty feet above your
head.  The room is set up for a huge party with decorations,
streamers, refreshments and loud music blasting.  The air is
clammy and a faint scent of death is barely detectable over the
reek of cheap perfumes and stale beer.  You feel an almost
uncontrollable urge to shotgun a couple Miller Lites.

Exits.Description: The ballroom continues north.
The ballroom continues east.
The ballroom continues south.
The ballroom continues west.

rooms.Name: The ballroom
rooms.Description:
A breath of fresh air is coming from the balcony to the east,
making it a bit easier to breath in this smoky ballroom.  The
loud music and the spinning lights are a little subdued here
near the doorway.  The crowd may be thinning out a bit and you
wonder if you should step out for a breath of real fresh air.

Exits.Description: The ballroom continues north.
A french door leads out onto the east balcony.
The ballroom continues south.
The ballroom continues east.

rooms.Name: The ballroom
rooms.Description:
The party is in full swing around you as you hover around just
outside of the ladies lounge trying to get lucky.  The music is
pounding in your ears and the room is hot and steamy with the
crowd dancing feverishly all around you.

Exits.Description: The door to the ladies lounge is to the north.
The ballroom continues east.
The ballroom continues south.

rooms.Name: The ballroom
rooms.Description:
The loud music and the spinning lights really make you a little
overwhelmed.  Through a haze of cigarette smoke you can see
the bandstand to the north flanked by two doors and the bar is
just visible through a doorway far to the west.

Exits.Description: The bandstand is to the north.
The ballroom continues east.
The ballroom continues south.
The ballroom continues west.

rooms.Name: The ballroom
rooms.Description:
At this end of the ballroom you are standing just outside of
the men's lounge to the north.  The bandstand is to the west and
the party still seems like its in full swing.  The music is
particularly loud here and through the haze of cigarette smoke
you wonder where the nearest exit is.

Exits.Description: The door to the men's lounge is to the north.
The ballroom continues south.
The ballroom continues west.

rooms.Name: The east balcony
rooms.Description:
You are standing just outside of the ballroom enjoying the cool
breeze and the fresh air.  You can see a house dimly in the
distance and a deep gorge running along the side of the yard
below.  The balcony continues to the north but it sure looks
dark.  You consider whether you should go back into the ballroom.

Exits.Description: The east balcony continues north.
A french door leads back into the ballroom.

rooms.Name: The bar
rooms.Description:
Here at the bar you gaze at the odd bottles and containers that
line the back of the bar in front of a mirror.  You look at your
reflection.  Yechh!  You wonder if there is anything to drink
that is half normal here.  The party is blasting behind you
while you consider whether to stay and get wasted or continue
on your search through the Addams Family mansion.

Exits.Description: A french door leads back to the ballroom.
A dumbwaiter is right next to the bar.
A large mirror runs along the length of the bar.

rooms.Name: Dumb waiter
rooms.Description:
Here clutching at the opening and hanging in midair, you wonder
if it would be a good idea to just climb back out before trying
to climb up and down.  Cold, fetid air is flowing from below and
jagged metal edges glint in the darkness.  The bar to the north
sure looks a lot more hospitable.

Exits.Description: A well-stocked bar is a few steps away to the north.
The dumbwaiter shaft plunges into darkness.

rooms.Name: The gallery
rooms.Description:
This large room is set up like an art gallery, with numerous
objects d'art displayed throughout the room.  There is an
odd statue of a large human hand, a huge mobile which seems to
be made of bones, a black tapestry that seems to be woven
from spider silk, and a large Grecian Urn.  Whats a grecian
urn you ask yourself?

Exits.Description: More, um, art is visible in the room to the south.
The room exits onto a hallway.

rooms.Name: The portrait room
rooms.Description:
This room has numerous portraits of some truly horrific creatures
hanging on the walls.  They are painted on black velvet (yech) and
are mounted on grotesquely ornate frames.  They seem to glow with
an unearthly, sickly green glow.  The nameplates at the base of
each painting read, "Morticia", "Gomez", "Fester", "Wednesday",
Pugsley", "Granny", and "It.

Exits.Description: More artwork is visible in the room to the north.
A dark room is to the south.

rooms.Name: The night gallery
rooms.Description:
This room is the darkest room you have ever seen.  There is a
complete absence of light and the moment after you step into
the room, you are totally disoriented.  Odd sounds echo around
you as you feel your way around carefully.  You have the odd
sensation that large objects may be around you and that they
may be moving.

Exits.Description: The next room seems brightly lit.
This dark room exits onto a hallway.

rooms.Name: A narrow corridor
rooms.Description:
This narrow corridor is lined with dark wallpaper with shadowy
images of strange creatures badly faded and hidden under a heavy
coat of dust.  There are some stairs to the north, and door to the
south, west, and east.

Exits.Description: Some stairs are visible to the north.
Some sort of billiards room is to the east.
A heavy ebony door leads to the south.
A door marked 'OFFICE' is to the west.

rooms.Name: Circular stairs
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the base of some circular stairs that spiral
upwards out of sight.  There is a corridor to the south and some
doorways are visible from here.  There is a draft here and a chill
breeze blows up your back.

Exits.Description: A hallway is visible to the south.
The circular stairs continue up.

rooms.Name: Circular stairs
rooms.Description:
These circular stairs are fashioned of ornate, wrought iron and
echo hollowly as you walk.  They end here at a hallway that runs
to the west and coil down into darkness.

Exits.Description: A hallway extends to the west.
The circular stairs continue down.

rooms.Name: A private hallway
rooms.Description:
Here in the family wing, numerous doors are visible that lead
to various rooms and chambers.  The floor is gritty underfoot
but the dust has been freshly disturbed.  You can hear a faint
whirring sound from the door to the south.

Exits.Description: The door has a sign on it that says NURSERY.
Some stairs are visible to the east.
A whirring sound comes from the other side of the door.
The hallway continues west.

rooms.Name: A private hallway
rooms.Description:
This hallway has doors to both the north and south with more
visible to the east.  To the west you can see a stairway which
heads up and out of sight.  The door to the south has a sign
on it.

Exits.Description: A door leads to a room.
The hallway continues east.
This door has a DO NOT DISTURB sign on it.
A staircase is just to the west.

rooms.Name: The train room
rooms.Description:
This room is crammed full of the most spectacular model train
layout you have ever seen.  Crowded with Lionel steam and diesel
locomotives pulling boxcars, tankers, and flatcars, the highly
details layout includes numerous bridges, road crossings, and
illuminated accessories.  You notice some odd, dark discolorations
on various areas on the layout and the air has the unmistakable
odor of cordite.

Exits.Description: A door leads back to the hallway.
A narrow door leads to the next room.
A firemen's pole leads down into the room below.

rooms.Name: The master bedroom
rooms.Description:
This large bedroom is dominated by a huge, round bed with black
satin sheets.  You notice some heavy steel rings have been set
into the four heavy oaken posts at each corner of the bed.  There
is a mirror on the ceiling and some pink champagne on ice.  You
wonder if you can check out and leave?

Exits.Description: A door leads out of the bedroom.
A narrow door leads to the next room.
A door leads to the next room.

rooms.Name: The master bath
rooms.Description:
A spectacular bathroom constructed of black tile and gold-plated
hardware, the room has an art deco look that seems rather out
of place in this house.  Perhaps the owners of the house like
to spend lots of time here.  In any case, there is a bidet, a
Japanese tub, several sinks, and the usual porcelain convenience.

Exits.Description: A door leads back to the bedroom.

rooms.Name: The sewing room
rooms.Description:
This rather small room has a simple stainless steel cart with a
small stool next to it.  On the cart you notice a suture tray
with a wide assortment of needles and cat gut.  You wonder what
the hell is being sewn around here?  The room smells strongly
of alcohol and antiseptics.

Exits.Description: A door leads back to the hallway.

rooms.Name: A narrow staircase
rooms.Description:
Standing here at the bottom of a narrow staircase that winds
up and out of sight, you wonder if you should go up or go down
the hall to the east.  The stairs look heavily worn and the dust
has been recently disturbed.

Exits.Description: A hallway is to the east.
The stairs continue up.

rooms.Name: A narrow staircase
rooms.Description:
On this narrow stairway, there is a door to the east through
which you can several other rooms.  The stairs and hallway here
are badly worn as if they have seen a lot of traffic.  The stairs
continue up and you can see the bottom of the stairs from where
you stand.

Exits.Description: A short hallway with several doors is visible to the east.
The stairs continue up.
The stairs continue down.

rooms.Name: A narrow staircase
rooms.Description:
This winding staircase is very narrow.  The stairs are dusty
and worn and you have to step carefully to keep from slipping.
The plaster walls are peeling and cracked.  High overhead, there
appears to be a trapdoor barely visible in the shadows.

Exits.Description: The stairs continue up.
The stairs continue down.

rooms.Name: A hallway
rooms.Description:
This short hallway leads from the stairs to three doors to the
north, south and east.  You notice that all three doors have some
heavy steel bars that can be used to bar the doors from the
outside.  Now why would anyone want to do that?

Exits.Description: The badly scarred door has a large P written on it in red.
A badly worn door leads into the next room.
This door is oddly cold to the touch.
Some stairs are visible to the west.

rooms.Name: Pugsley's room
rooms.Description:
This boy's room is filled with the normal belongings of any
twelve year old child.  Well, a twelve year old from the Twilight
Zone anyways.  Between the black light posters, rotting food, the
guillotine, the headless stuffed animals, and the numerous sharp
and pointy instruments, you get the feeling that this kid needs
a few visits to the local shrink.

Exits.Description: A door leads back to the hall.
A trapdoor is barely visible beneath your feet.

rooms.Name: Wednesday's room
rooms.Description:
This oddly cold room looks almost sterile compared to the rest
of the house.  Everything is black including the walls and the
floor and the bed that sits menacingly in one corner.  While your
breath steams in the frigid air, you get the odd feeling that
someone is watching you.

Exits.Description: A door leads back to the hall.
A trapdoor is cleverly concealed beneath your feet.

rooms.Name: The playroom
rooms.Description:
The children's playroom resembles some sort of medieval torture
chamber (why doesn't this surprise you?).  There are beautifully
made, scaled down versions of all of the common devices including
a rack, an iron maiden, and a pillory.  Numerous iron instruments
hang neatly on a Barney the Dinosaur coat rack next to a brazier
whose coals glow dimly.

Exits.Description: A large iron maiden leans against the wall.
A door leads back to the hall.

rooms.Name: The nursery
rooms.Description:
The nursery has been painted a rather vile blue color that
looks unsettling next to the black floor and ceiling.  There is
a crib in the middle of the room which has several candles burning
around it.  A mobile spins lazily overhead and there are several
stuffed animals that smell faintly of rotting meat scattered about
the nursery floor.

Exits.Description: A door leads back to the hallway.

ExtraDescs.Description:
When you look closer at this odd mobile, you realize that shards
of bone and cartilage are hanging from it.

rooms.Name: Sliding down in the darkness
rooms.Description:
Its black as pitch, you are spinning out of control hurtling down
some sort of steep pipe or chute.  Do you really expect to be
able to see anything?

Exits.Description: You can see nothing as you hurtle down in the darkness.

rooms.Name: In the front yard
rooms.Description:
Here in the front yard it is rather dark but you can still see
three odd hinged metal doors set into the wall just slightly
out of reach above your head.  These round doors are hinged at
the top and you look down to notice that the grass is badly
worn beneath your feet.

Exits.Description: The front yard continues to the east.
The front yard continues west.

rooms.Name: A narrow staircase
rooms.Description:
This narrow, dusty staircase is steep and badly worn.  The walls
are badly in need of some paint and you can hear the wind
whistling above you.  There appears to be a trapdoor at the
top of the stairs above you.

Exits.Description: A trapdoor with a pullstring leads up to the attic.
The stairs continue down.

rooms.Name: The attic
rooms.Description:
Oddly enough, this attic is completely empty, except for some
huge spiderwebs and some moldy blown-in insulation.  It appears to
have been unused for some time although some footprints are
clearly visible leading from the trapdoor to the east door.  A
gable fan sputters noisily in the eaves and the floorboards creak
ominously beneath you.

Exits.Description: A door leads onto the rooftop.
A trapdoor is clearly visible at your feet.

rooms.Name: On the roof
rooms.Description:
High on the roof you have a beautiful view of the surrounding
countryside.  At the south side of the roof is a huge cauldron
with a blazing fire burning beneath it.  It appears to be on some
sort of hinged arrangement that will allow the cauldron to be
tilted towards the edge of the roof.  How odd!  There is a door
to the west leading back into the house.

Exits.Description: A weatherbeaten door leads back into the house.
A cauldron full of boiling pitch does NOT look inviting.

rooms.Name: On a dark staircase
rooms.Description:
You feel strangely disoriented as you stop for a moment on the
stairs and realize that you cannot see the top or the bottom.
The stairs creak ominously with every step and the cold, stale
air that flows from the darkness below makes you sweat and
shiver at the same time.  Perhaps it would be better to head up
the stairs from here.

Exits.Description: The stairs continue up.
The stairs continue down.

rooms.Name: At the bottom of a dark staircase
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the southern end of a long, narrow hallway
where a steep, rickety staircase ascends to the west.  The air
is cold and stale down here, and odd odors and sounds make the
hairs on the back of your neck stand up.  The floor here looks
like packed earth and you hear an occasional rumbling sound
from the north.

Exits.Description: A dark, wet corridor extends to the north.
Some stairs lead up.

rooms.Name: A damp passageway
rooms.Description:
Here in a cramped, damp passageway far under the Mansion you
have to stoop slightly to keep from hitting your head on the
rough, rock ceiling.  The floor underneath is slippery and wet
and some foul, fetid odor makes you pause for a moment.  There is
a door to the east.

Exits.Description: The passageway continues north.
A heavy door leads into another room.
The passageway continues south towards some stairs.

rooms.Name: A damp passageway
rooms.Description:
The ceiling is very low here and you have to move carefully to
avoid banging your head on the rough stone ceiling.  There is
a door on either side of the corridor which continues into the
darkness to the north and south.  You feel a warm gust of air
coming from the east which makes the corridor feel that much
colder and damper.

Exits.Description: The passageway continues north.
A heavy door is to the east.
The passageway continues south.
A rotting door leads into another room.

rooms.Name: A damp passageway
rooms.Description:
You are at the northern end of a long, narrow passageway that
disappears into blackness to the south.  There is a heavy wooden
door to the north and to the west.  The floor is especially wet
here and the occasional rumbles that you have been hearing down
here seem closer than ever.

Exits.Description: A heavy wooden door leads to the north.
The passageway continues south.
A heavy wooden door is to the west.
